VIII.iv.6.B.2.d
.
Vocational Rehabilitation Services Covered Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
Compensation will be paid for disability or death that is proximately caused by training and rehabilitation services provided as part of an approved rehabilitation program under
38 U.S.C. Chapter 31
.
Note
:  This includes training and rehabilitation services provided by VA under
38 U.S.C. 3115
.
Reference
:  For more information on establishing causation for disability or death incurred due to training and rehabilitation services, see
38 CFR 3.361(d)(3)
, and
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 6.B.3.i
.
